ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: but will be roasted in a Searing Blaze.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But will be roasted in the fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and will enter the Blazing Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They will suffer the heat of hell fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And will go into the blazing fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And he shall enter a blazing Fire, and made to taste its burning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and he shall roast at a Blaze.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And be thrown to scorching fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and he will enter the blazing flame.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And he shall roast into a Blaze.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And he will enter a Blazing Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And shall enter a blazing Fire, and made to taste its burning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And [enter to] burn in a Blaze.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [84:12]   and he will enter the Blaze, an intense fire (a variant reading [for yaslā, ‘he will enter’] has yusallā, ‘he will be admitted’).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: And be thrown to scorching fire.
